    • Field Detail

      • ISSUER

        static final String ISSUER
        This overrides the discovery for the servlet and will be used globally. It may be overridden on a per client basis as well.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Constant Field Values

      • SCOPE_HANDLER

        static final String SCOPE_HANDLER
        (Optional) the fully qualified path and class name of the handler for these scopes. Note that only one handler for all scopes is allowed. If this is not found in the classpath, then an error will be raised. Alternately, you can simply override the configuration loader and specify your handler directly.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
